jx.jx_en_mean: emit a large amount of saliva from the mouth in a bodily seizure

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old Norse frotha, frauth

entry.def: Froth is a mass of small bubbles on the surface of a liquid.

example.ex: ...the froth of bubbles on the top of a glass of beer...
example.tran: 一杯啤酒表面的啤酒沫

entry.def: If a liquid froths, small bubbles appear on its surface.

example.ex: The sea froths over my feet...
example.tran: 海水在我的脚上泛起泡沫。

example.ex: Add a little of the warmed milk and allow to froth a little.
example.tran: 加一点温牛奶，并让它起点儿沫。

entry.tran: (因非常愤怒或激动而)嘴喷唾沫，口吐白沫
entry.def: If you say that someone is frothing, or that they are frothing at the mouth, you are emphasizing that they are very angry or excited about something.

example.ex: This story has many ingredients which make any news editor froth at the mouth with excitement.
example.tran: 这篇报道包含了众多元素，任何一个新闻编辑都会激动得嘴上唾沫横飞。

entry.tran: 迷人但没有实际价值的事物;虚浮的东西
entry.def: If you refer to an activity or object as froth, you disapprove of it because it appears exciting or attractive, but has very little real value or importance.

example.ex: No substance at all, just froth...
example.tran: 根本没有任何实质，只是一些虚浮的东西。

example.ex: Falling in love the first time is all froth and fantasy.
example.tran: 初恋完全是一场虚幻的美梦。

means.word_mean: 1. a mass of small bubbles formed in or on a liquid
2. make froth or foam and become bubbly;

auth_sentence.content: They then dipped bird feathers into the froth.
auth_sentence.res_content: They then dipped bird feathers into the froth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They then dipped bird feathers into the froth.

auth_sentence.content: The pink nylon dress in a froth over her arm.

auth_sentence.content: Bring to the boil, skim away any froth thrown up.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bring to the boil, skim away any froth thrown up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bring to the boil, skim away any froth thrown up.

sentences.en: The glass of beer was mostly froth.
sentences.cn: 这杯啤酒大部分是泡沫。

sentences.en: The play was amusing, but it was little more than froth.
sentences.cn: 这出戏还算有趣, 不过内容有些空泛。
